backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend for an Automatic Question Paper Generation System, including user profile management, subject CRUD, question bank operations, and paper generation with access control via role-based permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the Login page branding was updated from 'Exam Craft' to 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System' in frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and notable changes, serving as a build/change reference for all frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including sidebar, chart, and UI element variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System' and mounting the app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes and wraps them in an auth-guarded layout that redirects unauthenticated users to the Login page.
frontend/src/components/EditQuestionModa: Dialog modal component for editing an existing question, supporting category, difficulty, question text, and MCQ options fields with validation and backend update mutation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Sidebar layout component providing navigation links, user identity display, and logout functionality, with branding set to 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System'.
frontend/src/components/PaperCard.tsx: Displays a summary card for a generated exam paper showing subject name, date, duration, and marks, with a button to navigate to the paper preview page.
frontend/src/components/PaperSection.tsx: Renders a section of an exam paper with a title, numbered questions, optional MCQ options, and a marks summary header.
frontend/src/components/QuestionCard.tsx: Displays a single question with its category, difficulty, and optional MCQ options, along with edit and delete action buttons.
frontend/src/components/StatsCard.tsx: A simple stats display card showing a title, count, and icon with a gradient background.
frontend/src/components/SubjectManager.t: Manages CRUD operations for subjects, providing dialogs for adding, editing, and deleting subjects with form validation and error handling.
Renders a horizontal step-by-step workflow diagram illustrating the five-step exam paper generation process.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and status tracking via an AuthClient, exposed through a React context and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend CRUD operations covering subjects, questions, and bulk uploads, each using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Poppins and Inter fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for a navy blue academic theme including light/dark mode tokens, sidebar variables, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with TanStack QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AddQuestion.tsx: Page component for adding exam questions individually or via bulk CSV/JSON upload, with form validation, file parsing, preview, and submission using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying a welcome banner, stats cards for subjects/questions/papers, a workflow diagram, and a list of recently generated papers with navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratedPapers.tsx: Page that lists all previously generated exam papers sorted by creation date, with loading and empty states, and a button to navigate to paper generation.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratePaper.tsx: Form page that lets teachers configure and generate an exam paper by selecting a subject and specifying question counts per category, with availability validation before submission.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page featuring a two-panel layout with branding/feature highlights on the left and an Internet Identity sign-in button on the right.
frontend/src/pages/PaperPreview.tsx: Displays a preview of a generated exam paper by fetching paper, question, and subject data, grouping questions into sections by category, and providing a PDF download button with variant selection.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionBank.tsx: Renders the Question Bank page with tabs for browsing/filtering questions and managing subjects, supporting search by text, subject, category, and difficulty.
frontend/src/utils/csvParser.ts: Parses a CSV string into an array of question objects, validating required fields, category, difficulty, and marks consistency, returning both parsed questions and error messages.
frontend/src/utils/csvTemplate.ts: Generates and triggers a browser download of a CSV template file with example rows covering all question types for bulk question upload.
frontend/src/utils/docxParser.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/docxTemplate.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/jsonParser.ts: Parses a JSON string array into Question objects, validating required fields, category, difficulty, and MCQ-specific constraints, returning parsed questions and error messages.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates a printable HTML exam paper document from structured section and question data, opening it in a new browser window formatted for A4 PDF printing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, a design-token-based color palette (primary, navy, sidebar, etc.), border radii, shadows, and keyframe animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current state, existing features, and pending feature requests for the Automatic Question Paper Generation System, including app renaming and question bank edit/delete functionality.
